searchQuery: Religious Influence on Middle Eastern Policies

results.title: Messianic Jews and Pro-Trump Christians Gather at Messiah University
results.summary: Report on the Messianic Jewish Alliance of America conference, featuring Jonathan Cahn who claims God is working through President Donald Trump. Participants believe in a battle between good and evil manifested in modern politics and that threats to Israel are the work of demons. Cahn is quoted saying those who support abortion rights are part of “America’s cult of Baal”. Concerns are raised by a history professor who says the group’s views are not aligned with the college’s, warning against spiritual violence leading to political violence. "We wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places." (Ephesians 6:12).

title: Messianic Jews and Pro-Trump Christians Gather at Messiah University
